text: Can that geriatric kid actually see the future?
...He had these two royal captains deliver the order.
I see... Royals have clout here, so to make this persuasive...
The brigades will dispose of your so-called "devil that's the cause of all this," and the kingdom's crisis will be over.
Dratted Julius. He wasn't there when I needed him, and now he's being arbitrary again...
And they'll be given the leeway to prove their innocence, hmm?!
By making it look as though the devil user has been exiled from the kingdom, both the disposal of the boy and the issue of the brigades' responsibility will be put on hold!!
